suggestedNewContent.title: iOS and Safari Limitations
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Critical warning that Flutter Wasm cannot run on ANY iOS browser because Apple requires all browsers to use WebKit, which does not support WasmGC. Apps fall back to CanvasKit on these devices.

suggestedNewContent.title: Understanding Automatic Fallback
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain how Flutter loader detects WasmGC support at runtime and automatically chooses between skwasm and canvaskit renderers without developer intervention

suggestedNewContent.title: Testing Across Browsers
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Practical guide to testing Flutter web apps on different browsers, using BrowserStack or similar tools, verifying fallback behavior works correctly
